sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Container,
  Paper,
  Typography,
  Grid,
  Button,
  Chip,
  Divider,
} from '@mui/material';
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';
import DownloadIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Download';
import VerifiedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Verified';
import { motion } from 'framer-motion';

const DetailContainer = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({
  padding: theme.spacing(4),
  marginTop: theme.spacing(2),
  borderRadius: theme.spacing(2),
  boxShadow: '0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',
}));

const MetadataItem = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({
  marginBottom: theme.spacing(2),
}));

const BlockchainVerification = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({
  padding: theme.spacing(2),
  backgroundColor: theme.palette.success.light,
  color: theme.palette.success.contrastText,
  display: 'flex',
  alignItems: 'center',
  gap: theme.spacing(1),
  marginTop: theme.spacing(2),
}));

const HighlightedText = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({
  backgroundColor: theme.palette.primary.light,
  color: theme.palette.primary.main,
  padding: theme.spacing(0.5, 1),
  borderRadius: theme.spacing(0.5),
  display: 'inline-block',
  margin: theme.spacing(0.5),
}));

const JudgmentDetail = () => {
  // Mock data - replace with actual data from your backend
  const judgment = {
    title: 'Smith vs State of California',
    court: 'Supreme Court of India',
    date: '2023-12-15',
    caseNumber: 'CRL-123456-2023',
    petitioner: 'John Smith',
    respondent: 'State of California',
    judge: 'Hon. Justice Sarah Johnson',
    summary: 'This landmark case addresses the intersection of privacy rights and digital surveillance...',
    content: `Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

    Key Points:
    1. The court established new guidelines for digital privacy
    2. Surveillance methods must meet strict constitutional requirements
    3. Law enforcement agencies need proper warrants for digital searches`,
    blockchainId: '0x1234...5678',
    keyPoints: [
      'Digital privacy rights',
      'Constitutional interpretation',
      'Law enforcement guidelines',
    ],
    relatedCases: [
      'Privacy vs State (2022)',
      'Digital Rights Foundation Case (2021)',
      'Constitutional Privacy Matter (2020)',
    ],
  };

  return (
    <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ mt: 10, mb: 4 }}>
      <motion.div
        initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
        animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
      >
        <DetailContainer>
          <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
            {judgment.title}
          </Typography>

          <Grid container spacing={3}>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={8}>
              <MetadataItem>
                <Typography variant="subtitle2" color="text.secondary">
                  Court
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body1">{judgment.court}</Typography>
              </MetadataItem>

              <MetadataItem>
                <Typography variant="subtitle2" color="text.secondary">
                  Case Details
                </Typography>
                <Grid container spacing={2}>
                  <Grid item xs={6}>
                    <Typography variant="body2">Case Number:</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body1">{judgment.caseNumber}</Typography>
                  </Grid>
                  <Grid item xs={6}>
                    <Typography variant="body2">Date:</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body1">{judgment.date}</Typography>
                  </Grid>
                </Grid>
              </MetadataItem>

              <MetadataItem>
                <Typography variant="subtitle2" color="text.secondary">
                  Parties
                </Typography>
                <Grid container spacing={2}>
                  <Grid item xs={6}>
                    <Typography variant="body2">Petitioner:</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body1">{judgment.petitioner}</Typography>
                  </Grid>
                  <Grid item xs={6}>
                    <Typography variant="body2">Respondent:</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body1">{judgment.respondent}</Typography>
                  </Grid>
                </Grid>
              </MetadataItem>

              <Divider sx={{ my: 3 }} />

              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                Summary
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
                {judgment.summary}
              </Typography>

              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                Full Judgment
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
                {judgment.content}
              </Typography>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
              <Paper sx={{ p: 2, mb: 2 }}>
                <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                  Key Legal Points
                </Typography>
                <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 1 }}>
                  {judgment.keyPoints.map((point, index) => (
                    <HighlightedText key={index}>
                      {point}
                    </HighlightedText>
                  ))}
                </Box>
              </Paper>

              <Paper sx={{ p: 2, mb: 2 }}>
                <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                  Related Cases
                </Typography>
                {judgment.relatedCases.map((caseTitle, index) => (
                  <Chip
                    key={index}
                    label={caseTitle}
                    sx={{ m: 0.5 }}
                    onClick={() => {}}
                  />
                ))}
              </Paper>

              <Button
                variant="contained"
                startIcon={<DownloadIcon />}
                fullWidth
                sx={{ mb: 2 }}
              >
                Download PDF
              </Button>

              <BlockchainVerification>
                <VerifiedIcon color="inherit" />
                <Box>
                  <Typography variant="subtitle2">
                    Blockchain Verified
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="caption">
                    Transaction ID: {judgment.blockchainId}
                  </Typography>
                </Box>
              </BlockchainVerification>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </DetailContainer>
      </motion.div>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default JudgmentDetail;
